job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong><strong>Software Engineer</strong></strong> </p><p>tl;dr: An innovative seed-stage startup in the DevSecOps space is looking for a Software Engineer (fullstack) to join our team and help design and build a greenfield cybersecurity product using bleeding edge technology.<br> <strong>Our tech-stack and R&amp;D culture </strong></p> <p>As this is a greenfield application, we do not have all the details ironed out, <em>you</em> will help us do that. However, we do know we will be using: </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Node.js backend </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; React / Vue / Angular frontend </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; TypeScript on both </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Serverless, kubernetes, AWS </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Neo4j, MongoDB </p> <p>We will be putting a high emphasis on: </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Honing your skills </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; SOLID design principles </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Highly maintainable and testable code </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Non-blocking automatic CI/CD pipeline </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Letting developers develop and not distract them with endless unneeded meetings, procedures and rules </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Involvement and impact on the decision making process and roadmap of a new product </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Open-source use and contribute </p> <strong><strong>What do we expect you to bring to the table?</strong></strong> <p>We believe that for every highly functioning relationship, there must be a good synergy between the partners and that it must be a win-win situation for all. </p> <p>Our key requirements are: </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Enjoy your work and working with your team and be proud of it </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Assume best intentions – we know we will! </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Drive to build something amazing </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Be excited about data and coding </p> <p>● &nbsp; &nbsp; Have strong opinions, but hold them loosely </p> <p>&nbsp; </p><p><strong><strong>What will you be doing?</strong></strong><br> </p><p>As a seed-stage team member, you will be working on a greenfield application and ML models. You will be an integral part of the design and architecture decision process, working directly with the other team members and leadership (we have a very flat structure). In this role you will have a huge impact on the success of the company.</p>
